00033        I_BEGIN_COMPONENT(CGuiApplicationComp);
00034               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(ibase::IApplication);
00035               I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT(RuntimeStatus);
00036               I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT_INTERFACE(RuntimeStatus, ibase::IRuntimeStatusProvider, ExtractRuntimeStatus);
00037               I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT_INTERFACE(RuntimeStatus, imod::IModel, ExtractRuntimeStatus);
00038               I_REGISTER_SUBELEMENT_INTERFACE(RuntimeStatus, istd::IChangeable, ExtractRuntimeStatus);
00039               I_ASSIGN(m_mainGuiCompPtr, "MainGui", "Gui object shown as main window", false, "MainGui");
00040               I_ASSIGN(m_allowApplicationCloseCompPtr, "AllowClose", "Controls closing of the application", false, "AllowClose");
00041               I_ASSIGN_TO(m_allowApplicationCloseModelCompPtr, m_allowApplicationCloseCompPtr, false);
00042               I_ASSIGN(m_frameSpaceSizeAttrPtr, "FrameSpaceSize", "Number of pixels will be added on the all window sides", false, 9);
00043               I_ASSIGN(m_uiStartModeAttrPtr, "UiStartMode", "UI mode by application start up.\n0 - normal\n1 - full screen\n2 - minimized\n3 - maximized", false, 0);
00044        I_END_COMPONENT;
